page.title: 10C.P.S. INFANT SPORTS DAY
page.content: Yesterday we had our sports day.There was a ski@ping race for the big girls. For the boys and girls there was a relay race. We had a hoop race and a dolly race and a flat race. All the people thet were running did a flat race. In the hoop race, Katherine was my partner and we finished fourth. In the dolly race, Katherine was my partner again and we won! The dolly race was a race that somebody ran and got a dolly and then ran back to the start to get their partner and gave the other person the dolly and then held hands and ran to the finish line. This year our sports were held in the market Park, instead of at the High School sports fields.
